00017         const float Path::SUBDIVIDE_LENGTH = 5.0f;
00018 
00019         Path::Path(SketchElement *parent): SketchElement(parent)
00020         {
00021             boundingBox = 0;
00022         }
00023 
00024         Path::~Path()
00025         {
00026             for(vector<PathComponent*>::iterator iterator = components.begin();
00027                     iterator != components.end(); iterator++)
00028                 delete (*iterator);
00029             ListManager::getInstance()->deleteLists(list);
00030 
00031             if(boundingBox)
00032                 delete boundingBox;
00033         }
00034 
00035         SketchElementType Path::getType() const
00036         {
00037             return SKETCHELEMENTTYPE_PATH;
00038         }
00039 
00040         const float &Path::getSubdivideLength()
00041         {
00042             return SUBDIVIDE_LENGTH;
00043         }
00044 
00045         int Path::getNumberOfComponents() const
00046         {
00047             return (int) components.size();
00048         }
00049 
00050         PathComponent *Path::getComponent(int index) const
00051         {
00052             return components[index];
00053         }
00054 
00055         void Path::addComponent(PathComponent *component)
00056         {
00057             components.push_back(component);
00058         }
00059 
00060         void Path::finnish()
00061         {
00062             /* Start display list. */
00063             ListManager *listManager = ListManager::getInstance();
00064             list = listManager->createLists();
00065             listManager->beginList(list);
00066 
00067             /* Fill display list. */
00068             Renderer *renderer = new SketchyRenderer();
00069             render(renderer);
00070             delete renderer;
00071 
00072             /* End display list. */
00073             listManager->endList();
00074 
00075             /* Create bounding box. */
00076             DataRenderer *dataRenderer = new DataRenderer();
00077             render(dataRenderer);
00078             if(dataRenderer->getData()->size() >= 2)
00079                 boundingBox = new BoundingBox(dataRenderer->getData());
00080             delete dataRenderer;
00081         }
00082 
00083         void Path::render() const
00084         {
00085             ListManager::getInstance()->callList(list);
00086         }
00087 
00088         void Path::render(Renderer *renderer)
00089         {
00090             for(int i = 0; i < getNumberOfComponents(); i++) {
00091                 getComponent(i)->render(renderer);
00092             }
00093         }
00094 
00095         BoundingBox *Path::getBoundingBox()
00096         {
00097             return boundingBox;
00098         }
00099     }
00100 }
